titleStmt.title: Gods lift-up hand for Lancashire, presented in a sermon preached before the honorable committee of the county at Lancashire. Upon the 18th of December 1645. Being a solemne day of thankesgiving to God for clearing of the country, in subduing the enemies thereof. / By Nehemiah Barnet, minister at Lancaster.
titleStmt.author: Barnett, Nehemiah, b. 1614 or 15.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for John Williams, and are to be sold at the Crown in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
